listitem.para: The Debian basis has been updated from Debian 7 (Wheezy) to Debian 8 (Jessie) (43560, 41930). This means, among other things, the following upgrades:

listitem.simpara: Apache has been updated to 2.4.10.
Perl has been updated to 5.20.2.

UCS ships with systemd-sysv as default init system. This package is installed automatically on upgrades. All UCS init shell scripts have been made LSB compliant to be compatible with systemd. If custom init scripts are used or standard UCS init scrips haven been modified, please be aware that these may now have been superseded by systemd unit files or systemd itself (43330).
The codename for UCS 4.2 has been set to Lesum (42054).
The Linux kernel has been updated to 4.9.2 (42048).
The maximum transfer unit (MTU) for network interfaces can now be configured through the new &ucsUCRV; interfaces/interface/mtu (35814).
The functions remove_ucr_template and remove_ucr_info_file from the shell library ucr.sh have been deprecated. The library itself was moved into the package univention-config (27872).
ucr update is now automatically called when &ucsUCR; template files are added/modified/removed (23737).
&ucsUCR; now loads its data atomically to fix a problem when multiple threads access the database concurrently (37402).
The robustness of the services module has been improved to better handle process changes (34234).
An internal fallback implementation for pipes.quote() was added to fix an upgrade issue while python is not configured (43341).

The Python implementation has been changed to follow the Python contract for dictionaries, except one exception: The method get() still returns None instead of raising the exception KeyError when the key is not found, as this is still required to be compatible with previous releases (33101).
Several network start scripts have been adapted to work with systemd (42380).

The overlay module shadowbind has been added. This module checks shadowExpire and shadowMax/shadowLastChange of the bind DN object and denies the login if the account or the password is expired. The overlay can be enabled/disabled with the &ucsUCRV; ldap/shadowbind. An ignore LDAP filter (shadowbind does not check account/password expiry if the bind DN object matches this filter) can be configured with the &ucsUCRV; ldap/shadowbind/ignorefilter (36215).
If the slapd is already running when trying to start, the init-script does not signal failure anymore. A 5 second delay when starting slapd was removed (43450).
The slapd configuration option add_content_acl has been turned on (41797).
The overlay module constraint has been enabled. Security restrictions for the attributes uidNumber and gidNumber have been added. The value "0" is no longer valid for these attributes (43312).
The Listener daemon is now compiled with hardening options and return code checks have been improved (26039).
Kerberos support was removed from the Listener (42678).
The Listener cache backend has been converted to LMDB (23367).
The timeout and retry handling of the BIND9 LDAP database plugin has been improved (42389).

During the update of DNS servers having univention-bind installed the &ucsUCR; settings nameserver123 and dns/forwarder123 are checked and fixed automatically. This is done by running /usr/share/univention-server/univention-fix-ucr-dns once (43217).
Quoting of the server name has been added (42240).
The general design of the web interface has been improved. Several aspects of the design are borrowed from the Google Material Design guidelines (42261, 42264, 43451, 42266).

A central portal site has been added to UCS. It allows to have a central site which shows all installed Apps in a UCS domain. Furthermore, the portal page can be configured and customized (42233, 42175, 42231, 43495).
A server overview site has been added to UCS. It allows to search for and navigate to particular server instances in the UCS domain (43595).
JavaScript and CSS code has been moved from &ucsUMC; into a generic and separate web library that can be used by other web applications, as well (38824).

Global menu entries can now be defined via JavaScript hook modules. A JavaScript hook module needs to be placed as module in the JavaScript directory umc/hook and it needs to be defined via the &ucsUCRV; umc/web/hooks/<packageName>=<javaScriptModule> (42263).
Improved internationalization for JavaScript files in UMC (42293).
The correct service name is shown when the start behavior is configured through the &ucsUCRV; umc/http/autostart (42340).

Various security improvements have been done to guard against Cross Site Request Forgery (XSRF), Cross Site Scripting (XSS) and Clickjacking attacks. The HTTP response header X-Frame-Options, Content-Security-Policy, X-Content-Type-Options, X-XSS-Protection and X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies are now set by default (39733, 39731).
A menu entry for changing the language has been added (40612).
In certain situations it was possible that the translations were mixed. This has been fixed (38370).
Traceback reports do not require an authenticated session anymore and can be sent anonymously (42169).
Plural forms for translations are now supported in the JavaScript code (42220).
The correct service name is shown when the start behavior is configured through the &ucsUCRV; umc/server/autostart (42339).
More characters in the version of an App are allowed (41905).
Adjustments have been made to work with the new Docker version or other software components (43338, 43607, 43458).
Code cleanup where deprecated functions of Univention Directory Manager were used (43624).

section.title: &ucsUDM; UMC modules and command line interface

listitem.simpara: The existence of objects is now checked before initializing it (38110).

The syntax class ObjectFlag now accepts the value docker (which is used to mark computer objects that are created specifically for Docker App Containers); the corresponding attribute is now a multivalued, making it possible to store more than one flag on an object (43148).
The UDM specific JavaScript widget LinkList has been moved to univention-management-console-module-udm from univention-management-console-frontend (42321).

section.title: Modules for system settings / setup wizard

listitem.simpara: The setup wizard has been refactored to be a standalone web application (42172).
The package dbus-x11 is installed by default to silence firefox (36168).
Illegal characters don't cause a crash when viewing the logfile anymore (41539).
The "execute pending join scripts" button is now grayed out if no unconfigured join scripts exists (35326).
Illegal characters don't cause a crash when viewing the logfile anymore (41539).
Templates used when creating new users now work for all properties regardless (43428).
The layout of user templates has been synchronized with the layout of the users modules (42765).
Some broken mappings of user templates have been fixed (29672).
The help and example for the DNS reverse zone subnet property has been improved (34131).
The description for the negative time-to-live property has been corrected (33165).
Long descriptions have been added to all DNS module properties (42820).
DNS names are now checked for validity according to 2181. PTR entries are now shown in forward notation as IP addresses and can be searched for (25354).
The DHCP modules now validate the input fields better and require a valid IP address or host name to be entered (33211).
Long descriptions have been added to all DHCP module properties (42820).
Listing policies for DHCP host entries now works with multiple DHCP services and for entries with none or multiple IP addresses (42849).
Support for dynamic address assignment using pools for known hosts has been improved 16923.
A memory leak has been fixed. A crash during startup if the LDAP server was unreachable has been fixed (31078).
DHCP options and DHCP statements can now be configured via &ucsUMC; (32557).
The long descriptions of the DHCP server statements policy have been corrected (34441).
The updater scripts preup.sh and postup.sh have been adapted to the needs of UCS 4.2 (42037).
The pre-check of the UCS 4.2 upgrade now checks if essential server role packages should be removed during the upgrade. In this case the upgrade process is stopped previously (39092).
The package python-pysaml2 3.0.0-5 has been ported back from Debian Stretch (43547).
The missing package conflicts between univention-heimdal-kdc and univention-heimdal-member were added (34258).
The Listener scripts for creating Kerberos keys were fixed to no drop root permissions (43409).
The Listener scripts for creating Kerberos keys were updated to use the new location of ktutil and kadmin (43492).
The Squid proxy server was upgraded to version 3.4.8 and its configuration adapted (43580).
The Squid proxy server now uses STARTTLS to encrypt all LDAP connections (43676).
A bug fix for Squidguards update-squidguard script was backported from the 1.5-5 release (43581).
Apache configuration files in the packages univention-apache, univention-novnc, univention-nagios and univention-system-activation have been adapted to apache version 2.4 (42196, 42296).
The PAM configuration now uses the user_envfile option for reading files from the user home directory (43287).
univention-tftp has been updated due to a newer syslinux version, this fixes the path to the pxelinux.0 binary.
Error handling has been improved (38634).
The start script for libvirtd has been updates to be compatible with systemd (43493).
Docker has been updated to 1.12 (42282).
The &ucsUDL; is restarted after the &ucsUCRV; samba4/role gets set in the joinscript (43501).
Samba has been updated to version 4.6.0~rc2 (40661).
univention-samba4 has been adjusted to flush caches during initial install before committing the SYSVOL ACLs (41319).
Samba has been adjusted to avoid problems in case an administrator created a container CN=System somewhere (31763).
The samba4-idmap.py listener module has been improved to initialize the idmap during module resynchronization (42819).
The samba4-idmap.py listener module now flushes the samba gencache at the end of --direct-resync (41319).
univention-samba and univention-samba4 now use the interfaces defined in &ucsUCR; (43073).
samba_dnsupdate now avoids adding a _msdcs NS record if the corresponding SOA record is not present (43291).
The escaping of LDAP filter expressions in the S4 Connector has been improved (32086).
The generation of filters from &ucsUCRV; connector/s4/mapping/dns/ignorelist has been fixed (43397).
The S4 Connector can now handle large groups if Samba returns ranged results (41764).
All packages have been updated to no longer depend on deprecated packages and features (42183).
ucslint check for missing quoting in function local variable assignments (41926).
ucslint checks Debian maintainer scripts for wrong comments naming a different maintainer script (32539).
ucslint warns of dependencies on transitional packages (37203).
ucslint checks were added to the build process of some packages (23837).
ucslint skips checking some generated files (43284).
The service portmap was renamed to rpcbind (36571).

The init scripts of all services have been made Linux Standard Base (LSB) compliant to allow insserv to automatically reorder them based on dependencies (38438). The test for insserv has been remove (43306).
The &ucsUCRV; version/erratalevel gets reset to 0 (43300).
Renaming and moving objects into names containing a comma is now possible (43332).

The generation of the maintenance script to remove obsolete files form a local repository has been fixed: It no longer removes the cryptographic signatures of the updater scripts and dists/ directories required for network installation (39582). It also uses the correct path to remove obsolete packages (28048).
unbind() methods have been added to the classes univention.uldap and univention.admin.uldap (37519).
The class univention.lib.umc_connection.UMCConnection has been replaced with the new and more flexible class univention.lib.umc.Client (34498).

The following packages have been back-ported and built in order to update to the newer docker version: golang, containerd, golang-1.6, runc, golang-codegangsta-cli, golang-github-coreos-go-systemd, golang-github-docker-go-units, golang-github-opencontainers-specs, golang-github-seccomp-libseccomp-golang, golang-github-vishvananda-netlink, dh-golang, golang-dbus, golang-github-xeipuuv-gojsonschema, golang-testify, golang-github-xeipuuv-gojsonreference, golang-github-xeipuuv-gojsonpointer, golang-github-davecgh-go-spew, golang-github-pmezard-go-difflib, libseccomp, golang-github-vishvananda-netns, golang-objx (42282).

The following packages have been added to the maintained section of the software repository: python-cups, univention-mysql, recode, freetds, xmlrpc-epi, libwebp, uw-imap, firebird2.5 (42311, 42509, 43481)
The package xserver-xorg-input-all does no longer depend on xserver-xorg-input-vmmouse since it is obsolete with the latest kernel changes (43460).
The package python-univention-directory-manager-legacy-ucd-tcs has been removed (41637).
The packages univention-log-collector-server and univention-log-collector-client have been removed from UCS (41638).

During the upgrade to UCS 4.2, it could happened that a restart of the SpamAssassin daemon failed due to old Perl modules. The updated perl package ensures now that the spamassassin package is previously updated (43534).
Some old packages like emacs23 are no longer part of Debian Jessie. Dependencies on such old packages have been updated to their replacements (43649).
Old custom firefox packages have been replaced with the Debian upstream package firefox-esr. During the update to &ucsUCS; 4.2-0 the old package are automatically replaced (42322).
